Sentencas: Highly porous ceramics are critical components of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells.
Titulo: Strength of Highly Porous Ceramic Electrodes

Sentencas: Nevertheless, their mechanical properties are poor and not fully understood.
Titulo: Strength of Highly Porous Ceramic Electrodes

Sentencas: Herein, Discrete Element simulations are used to quantitatively assess the relation between the particulate microstructure of highly porous ceramics and their mechanical properties.
Titulo: Strength of Highly Porous Ceramic Electrodes

Sentencas: Partially sintered ceramics are numerically generated with complex microstructures including pore formers and bilayers.
Titulo: Strength of Highly Porous Ceramic Electrodes

Sentencas: These microstructures are then tested in tension and compression to obtain their elastic and fracture behavior.
Titulo: Strength of Highly Porous Ceramic Electrodes

Sentencas: Compiling experimental data from the literature and simulations results, an Orowan-Petch type relation between strength and particle size is proposed for highly porous ceramics.
Titulo: Strength of Highly Porous Ceramic Electrodes

Sentencas: It is based on the local fracture model at the length scale of solid bonds between sintered particles.
Titulo: Strength of Highly Porous Ceramic Electrodes
